Topic.Title: wondering about the restrictions/rules to stuff you can put in a game

Posts.EditableText: heyo! newbie here, and im not completely sure where to put this, so its going here for now. but i plan to make some adult games, including ***many*** sensitive subjects and such on, and im wondering what is too much/too far? or if there's no restriction, or?
Posts.HTML: heyo! newbie here, and im not completely sure where to put this, so its going here for now. but i plan to make some adult games, including many sensitive subjects and such on, and im wondering what is too much/too far? or if there's no restriction, or?

Posts.EditableText:
restrictions on your game and/or uploading your game to quest servers/site: laws (such as the universal law of child porn)

otherwise, no restrictions (aside from whatever policies the site/server owner, Manowar, has stated/declared, if uploading to quest site/servers), though in general you should have content tags and stating the game is adult game and legality (if you play/download this game, you're affirming you're of legal age to view adult comtent, under penalty of perjury, yada yada yada), especially if you upload to the quest servers/site

Posts.EditableText: alright! thank you for clearing that up, just wanted to make sure!
Posts.HTML: alright! thank you for clearing that up, just wanted to make sure!

you can maybe get some help/advice/etc from user 'Anonynn', as she's making an adult game:

she's got quite the growing game, lots of writing and/or coding (she's been learning to code too on her own, and from us helping her with code/game-features, she wants/needs help with making/putting into her game)
